## Type of Change

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`task test`)
- [ ] Type checks pass (`task type-check`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`task lint`)
- [ ] Code is formatted (`task format`)

- [ ] Updated documentation if needed
- [ ] Followed code style guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md
